00030 template <
00031   class CHAR_TYPE = char,
00032   int COPY_ON_WRITE = 1,
00033   uint32_t BUCKET_BYTES = 1024 //BYTES
00034   >
00035 class deque_string
00036 {
00037 public:
00038   typedef CHAR_TYPE value_type;
00039   typedef CHAR_TYPE CharT;
00040   typedef uint8_t  ReferT;
00041   typedef deque_string<CHAR_TYPE, COPY_ON_WRITE, BUCKET_BYTES> SelfT;
00042   typedef std::size_t size_t;
00043   enum 
00044     {
00045       BUCKET_LENGTH = BUCKET_BYTES/sizeof(CharT)
00046     };
00047     
00048   
00049   static const size_t npos;

00051   class const_iterator;
00052   
00053   class iterator :
00054     public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, CharT>
00055   {
00056 
00057   friend class const_iterator;
00058   public:
00059     iterator(SelfT* obj=NULL, const uint64_t* entry_array=NULL, size_t entry_i=-1, const size_t ii=0)
00060       : entry_array_(entry_array), entry_i_(entry_i), ii_(ii), obj_(obj)
00061     {
00062     }
00063     
00064     ~iterator() {}
00065 
00066     // The assignment and relational operators are straightforward
00067     iterator& operator = (const iterator& other)
00068     {
00069       entry_array_ = other.entry_array_;
00070       entry_i_ = other.entry_i_;
00071       ii_ = other.ii_;
00072       obj_ = other.obj_;
00073       
00074       return(*this);
00075     }
00076 
00077     bool operator==(const iterator& other)const
00078     {
00079       return(ii_ == other.ii_ && entry_i_ == other.entry_i_ && entry_array_==other.entry_array_);
00080     }
00081 
00082     bool operator != (const iterator& other)const
00083     {
00084       return(ii_ != other.ii_ || entry_i_ != other.entry_i_ || entry_array_!=other.entry_array_);
00085     }
00086 
00087     bool operator < (const iterator& other)const
00088     {
00089       return entry_i_ < other.entry_i_ ||
00090         entry_i_ == other.entry_i_ && ii_ < other.ii_;
00091     }
00092     
00093     bool operator > (const iterator& other)const
00094     {
00095       return entry_i_ > other.entry_i_ ||
00096         entry_i_ == other.entry_i_ && ii_ > other.ii_;
00097     }
00098 
00099     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00100     // SQueue.
00101     iterator& operator++()
00102     {
00103       if (ii_== BUCKET_LENGTH-1)
00104       {
00105         ii_ = 0;
00106         entry_i_++;
00107         return *this;
00108       }
00109 
00110       ii_++;
00111             
00112       return(*this);
00113     }
00114 
00115     iterator operator++(int)
00116     {
00117       iterator tmp(*this);
00118       
00119       if (ii_== BUCKET_LENGTH-1)
00120       {
00121         ii_ = 0;
00122         entry_i_++;
00123         return tmp;
00124       }
00125 
00126       ii_++;
00127 
00128       return(tmp);
00129     }
00130 
00131     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00132     // SQueue.
00133     iterator& operator--()
00134     {
00135       if (ii_ == 0)
00136       {
00137         entry_i_--;
00138         ii_= BUCKET_LENGTH -1;
00139         return *this;
00140       }
00141 
00142       ii_--;
00143 
00144       return(*this);
00145     }
00146 
00147     iterator operator--(int)
00148     {
00149       iterator tmp(*this);
00150       if (ii_ == 0)
00151       {
00152         entry_i_--;
00153         ii_= BUCKET_LENGTH -1;
00154         return tmp;
00155       }
00156 
00157       ii_--;
00158 
00159       return(tmp);
00160     }
00161 
00162     // Return a reference to the value in the node.  I do this instead
00163     // of returning by value so a caller can update the value in the
00164     // node directly.
00165     CharT& operator*()
00166     {
00167       if (obj_->is_refered())
00168       {
00169         (*obj_).assign_self();
00170         entry_array_ = obj_->get_entry_array();
00171       }
00172       
00173       return ((CharT*)(entry_array_[entry_i_]))[ii_];
00174     }
00175 
00176     uint64_t operator - (const iterator& other) const
00177     {
00178       if (entry_array_ != other.entry_array_)
00179         return -1;
00180 
00181       return entry_i_*BUCKET_LENGTH+ii_ - other.entry_i_*BUCKET_LENGTH+other.ii_;
00182     }
00183 
00184     iterator operator + (const int& gap) 
00185     {
00186       iterator tmp(*this);
00187       size_t t = entry_i_*BUCKET_LENGTH+ii_;
00188       t += gap;
00189       tmp.entry_i_ = t/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00190       tmp.ii_ = t%BUCKET_LENGTH;
00191       return tmp;
00192     }
00193 
00194     iterator operator - (const int& gap) 
00195     {
00196       iterator tmp(*this);
00197       size_t t = entry_i_*BUCKET_LENGTH+ii_;
00198       t -= gap;
00199       tmp.entry_i_ = t/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00200       tmp.ii_ = t%BUCKET_LENGTH;
00201       return tmp;
00202     }
00203     
00204   protected:
00205     const uint64_t* entry_array_;
00206     size_t entry_i_;
00207     size_t ii_;
00208     SelfT* obj_;
00209   };

00696   
00697 protected:
00698   char* p_; 
00699   size_t start_i_;
00700   size_t length_;
00701   size_t max_size_;
00702   size_t entry_size_;
00703   CharT** en_array_;
00704 
00705   bool refer()
00706   {
00707     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00708       return false;
00709     
00710     //lock    
00711     if (p_!=NULL)
00712       (*(ReferT*)p_)++;
00713 
00714     return true;
00715   }
00716   
00717   void derefer()
00718   { 
00719     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00720     {
00721       if (p_!=NULL)
00722       {
00723         hlfree(p_);
00724         p_ = NULL;
00725       }
00726       
00727       return ;
00728     }
00729 
00730     //lock
00731     if (p_!=NULL)
00732       if (*(ReferT*)p_ > 0)
00733       (*(ReferT*)p_)--;
00734 
00735     if (p_!=NULL)
00736       if (*(ReferT*)p_== 0)
00737       {
00738         for (size_t i=0; i<entry_size_; i++)
00739           if (get_entry(i)!=NULL)
00740           {
00741             hlfree(get_entry(i));
00742             set_entry(i, NULL);
00743           }
00744         
00745         hlfree(p_);
00746         p_ = NULL;
00747       }
00748     
00749   }
00750 
00751   inline void clear_reference()
00752   {     
00753     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00754       return ;
00755 
00756     //lock
00757     if (p_!=NULL)
00758       (*(ReferT*)p_) = 1;
00759   }
00760 
00761   bool is_refered() const
00762   {
00763     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00764       return false;
00765     
00766     //lock
00767     if (p_ == NULL)
00768       return false;
00769     
00770     if (*(ReferT*)p_ > 1)
00771       return true;
00772 
00773     return false;
00774   }
00775    
00776   void assign_self()
00777   {
00778     if (!is_refered())
00779       return;
00780 
00781     char* p;
00782     size_t es = init_entry(length_, &p);
00783     size_t st = BUCKET_LENGTH;
00784     size_t ei = 0;
00785 
00786     const_iterator it = begin();
00787     for (size_t i=0; it!=end() && i<length_; i++, it++)
00788     {
00789       if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
00790         ei++;
00791       
00792       ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
00793         = *it;
00794       
00795     }
00796         
00797     derefer();
00798     p_ = p;
00799     start_i_ = st;
00800     entry_size_ = es;
00801     max_size_ = init_max_size();
00802     
00803     clear_reference(); 
00804   }
00805 
00806   inline size_t getLen(const CharT* s) const
00807   {
00808     CharT e = '\0';
00809     size_t i = 0;
00810     
00811     while (s[i]!=e)
00812     {
00813       i++;
00814     }
00815 
00816     return i;
00817   }
00818 
00819   inline size_t start_entry_index()const
00820   {
00821     return (start_i_)/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00822   }
00823 
00824   inline size_t end_entry_index() const
00825   {
00826     return (start_i_ + length_ - (length_==0? 0 : 1))/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00827   }
00828 
00829   inline size_t char_index_in_bucket(size_t i)const
00830   {
00831     if (i==(size_t)-1)
00832       return 0;
00833     
00834     return (start_i_ + i)%BUCKET_LENGTH;
00835   }
00836   
00837   inline size_t get_entry_index(size_t char_index)const
00838   {
00839     return (start_i_+char_index)/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00840   }
00841   
00842   inline void set_char(size_t index, CharT c)
00843   {
00844     size_t i = index + start_i_;
00845     (get_entry(i/BUCKET_LENGTH))[i%BUCKET_LENGTH] = c;
00846   }
00847 
00848   inline CharT& get_char(size_t index)
00849   {
00850     size_t i = index + start_i_;
00851     return ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i/BUCKET_LENGTH*sizeof(CharT*))))[i%BUCKET_LENGTH];
00852     //return ((get_entry(i/BUCKET_LENGTH))[i%BUCKET_LENGTH]);
00853   }
00854 
00855   inline const CharT& get_const_char(size_t index)const
00856   {
00857     size_t i = index + start_i_;
00858     return ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i/BUCKET_LENGTH*sizeof(CharT*))))[i%BUCKET_LENGTH];
00859     //return (get_const_entry(i/BUCKET_LENGTH)[i%BUCKET_LENGTH]);
00860   }
00861 
00862   inline CharT* get_entry(size_t i)
00863   {
00864     return (CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i*sizeof(CharT*)));
00865   }
00866 
00867   inline const CharT* get_const_entry(size_t i) const
00868   {
00869     return (CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i*sizeof(CharT*)));
00870   }
00871 
00872   inline uint64_t* get_entry_array()
00873   {
00874     return (uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT));
00875   }
00876 
00877   inline const uint64_t* get_const_entry_array() const
00878   {
00879     return (uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT));
00880   }
00881 
00882   inline size_t need_bucket_num(size_t k) const
00883   {
00884     return k/BUCKET_LENGTH + (k%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
00885   }
00886   
00887   inline size_t need_entry_bytes(size_t size)const
00888   {
00889     return sizeof(ReferT) + size*sizeof(CharT*);
00890   }
00891 
00892   inline size_t need_entry_size(size_t length)const
00893   {
00894     size_t es = (length + start_i_);
00895     return need_bucket_num(es);
00896   }
00897 
00898   inline void set_entry(size_t i, CharT* p)
00899   {
00900     *(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i*sizeof(CharT*)) = (uint64_t)p;
00901   }
00902 
00903   inline char* malloc_char(uint64_t bytes)
00904   {
00905     return (char*)hlmalloc(bytes); 
00906   }
00907 
00908   inline CharT* malloc_CharT(uint64_t bytes = BUCKET_BYTES)
00909   {
00910     return (CharT*)hlmalloc(bytes); 
00911   }
00912 
00913   size_t init_entry(size_t length, char** pp)
00914   {
00915     if (length==0 || length==(size_t)-1)
00916       length = 1;
00917     
00918     size_t es = need_bucket_num(length)+2;
00919     
00920     *pp = malloc_char(need_entry_bytes(es));
00921     *(uint64_t*)(*pp + sizeof(ReferT) + 0*sizeof(CharT*)) = 0;
00922     
00923     for (size_t i=1; i<es-1; i++)
00924       *(uint64_t*)(*pp + sizeof(ReferT) + i*sizeof(CharT*)) = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
00925       
00926     *(uint64_t*)(*pp + sizeof(ReferT) + (es-1)*sizeof(CharT*)) = 0;
00927 
00928     en_array_ = (CharT**)(*pp+sizeof(ReferT));
00929 
00930     return es;
00931   }
00932 
00933   size_t init_max_size() const
00934   {
00935     return (entry_size_-2)*BUCKET_LENGTH;
00936   }
00937   
00938 
00939   void extend_entry(size_t t, bool back=true)
00940   {
00941     p_ = (char*)hlrealloc(p_, need_entry_bytes(entry_size_+t));
00942     
00943     if (back)
00944     {
00945       for (size_t i=0; i<t; i++)
00946         set_entry(entry_size_+i, NULL);
00947       entry_size_ += t;
00948     }
00949     else
00950     {
00951       uint64_t* entry = get_entry_array();
00952       size_t e = end_entry_index();
00953       for (size_t i=e; i!=(size_t)-1; i--)
00954         entry[i+t] = entry[i];
00955       
00956       start_i_ += t*BUCKET_LENGTH;
00957       
00958       for (size_t i=0; i<t; i++)
00959         entry[i]= 0;
00960       entry_size_ += t;
00961     }
00962     
00963   }
00964 
00965   void add_buckets(size_t t, bool back=true)
00966   {
00967     //std::cout<<t<<std::endl;
00968     
00969     if (t ==0)
00970       return;
00971 
00972     //t = (size_t)(3*t);
00973     
00974     if (back)
00975     {
00976       if (end_entry_index()+t >= entry_size_)
00977         extend_entry(t);
00978     
00979       for (size_t i=0; i<t; i++)
00980       {  
00981         if (get_entry(end_entry_index()+i+1)==NULL)
00982         {
00983           set_entry(end_entry_index()+i+1, malloc_CharT());
00984           max_size_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
00985         }
00986       }
00987     }
00988     else
00989     {
00990       if (start_entry_index()<t)
00991         extend_entry(t-start_entry_index(),false);
00992 
00993       size_t s = start_entry_index()-1;
00994       for (size_t i=0; i<t; i++)
00995       {  
00996         if (get_entry(s-i)==NULL)
00997         {
00998           set_entry(s-i, malloc_CharT());
00999           max_size_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
01000         }
01001       }
01002     }
01003   }
01004   
01005 public:
01009   explicit deque_string()
01010   {
01011     entry_size_ = init_entry(1, &p_);
01012     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01013     length_ = 0;
01014     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01015     clear_reference();
01016   }

01199   {
01200     if (length_==0)
01201       return begin();
01202     
01203     return const_iterator(get_const_entry_array(), end_entry_index(),
01204                           char_index_in_bucket(length_-1))+1;
01205   }

01208   {
01209     if (length_==0)

01211

01213                     char_index_in_bucket(length_-1))+1;
01214   }

01260   //******************Capacity********************
01261 public:
01262 
01267   size_t size() const
01268   {
01269     return length_ * sizeof(CharT);
01270   }
01271 
01275   size_t length() const
01276   {
01277     return length_;
01278   }
01279 
01283   size_t max_size ( ) const
01284   {
01285     return (max_size_);
01286   }
01287 
01299   void resize (size_t n, CharT c)
01300   {
01301     assert (max_size_>=length_);
01302     
01303     if (n == length_ && n == max_size_)
01304       return;
01305 
01306     if (is_refered())
01307     {
01308       char* p;
01309       size_t es = init_entry(n, &p);
01310       size_t st = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01311       
01312       const_iterator it = begin();
01313       size_t i=0;
01314       size_t ei = 0;
01315       for (;it!= end() && i<n; i++, it++)
01316       {
01317         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
01318           ei++;
01319       
01320         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
01321           = *it;
01322       }
01323 
01324       for (;i<n; i++)
01325         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
01326           = c;
01327             
01328       derefer();
01329       start_i_ = st;
01330       entry_size_ = es;
01331       max_size_ = init_max_size();
01332       length_ = n;
01333       p_ = p;
01334       clear_reference();
01335       return;
01336     }
01337 
01338     if (n > max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)
01339     {
01340       size_t t = n - max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH;
01341       add_buckets(need_bucket_num(t));
01342     }
01343     else if (n < max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)
01344     {
01345       size_t t = get_entry_index(n);
01346       for (size_t i=t+1; i<entry_size_; i++)
01347       {
01348         if (get_entry(i)!=NULL)
01349         {
01350           hlfree(get_entry(i));
01351           set_entry(i, NULL);
01352           max_size_ -= BUCKET_LENGTH;
01353         }
01354       }
01355     }
01356 
01357     iterator it = end();
01358     size_t i=length_;
01359     for (;i<n; i++, it++)
01360       *it = c;
01361     length_ = n;
01362   }
01363   
01364 
01365   void resize ( size_t n )
01366   {
01367     assert (max_size_>=length_);
01368     
01369     if (n == max_size_)
01370     {
01371       length_ = n;
01372       return;
01373     }
01374 
01375     if (is_refered())
01376     {
01377       char* p;
01378       size_t es = init_entry(n, &p);
01379       size_t st = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01380       
01381       const_iterator it = begin();
01382       size_t i=0;
01383       size_t ei = 0;
01384       for (;it!= end() && i<n; i++, it++)
01385       {
01386         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
01387           ei++;
01388       
01389         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
01390           = *it;
01391       }
01392             
01393       derefer();
01394       start_i_ = st;
01395       entry_size_ = es;
01396       max_size_ = init_max_size();
01397       length_ = n;
01398       p_ = p;
01399       clear_reference();
01400       return;
01401     }
01402 
01403     if (n > max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)
01404     {
01405       size_t t = n - max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH;
01406       add_buckets(need_bucket_num(t));
01407     }
01408     else if (n < max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)
01409     {
01410       size_t t = get_entry_index(n-1);
01411       for (size_t i=t+1; i<entry_size_; i++)
01412       {
01413         if (get_entry(i)!=NULL)
01414         {
01415           hlfree(get_entry(i));
01416           set_entry(i, NULL);
01417           max_size_ -= BUCKET_LENGTH;
01418         }
01419       }
01420     }
01421     
01422 
01423     length_ = n;
01424     
01425   }
01426 
01440   size_t capacity ( ) const
01441   {
01442     return max_size_ * sizeof(CharT);
01443   }
01444 
01453   void reserve ( size_t res_arg=0 )
01454   {
01455     if (res_arg<= capacity())
01456       return;
01457 
01458     size_t len = length_;
01459     resize(res_arg/sizeof(CharT));
01460     length_ = len;
01461   }
01462 
01467   void clear()
01468   {
01469     derefer();
01470     length_ = max_size_ = 0;
01471     start_i_ = -1;
01472   }

01524   //******************Modifiers********************
01525 public:
01533   SelfT& operator+= ( const SelfT& str )
01534   {
01535     return append(str);
01536   }
01537   
01538   SelfT& operator+= ( const CharT* s )
01539   {
01540     size_t len = getLen(s);
01541     return append(s, len);
01542   }
01543   
01544   SelfT& operator+= ( CharT c )
01545   {

01547   }
01548 
01552   SelfT& append ( const SelfT& str )
01553   {
01554     if (!str.length())
01555       return *this;
01556 
01557     assign_self();
01558 
01559     if (p_==NULL)
01560       return assign(str);
01561     
01562     if (char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+str.length()>BUCKET_LENGTH)
01563       add_buckets((char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+ 1 + str.length())/BUCKET_LENGTH);
01564 
01565     const_iterator j=str.begin();
01566     size_t g = 0;
01567     for (iterator i=end();g<str.length();g++,i++,j++)
01568       *i = *j;
01569 
01570     length_ += str.length();
01571     clear_reference();
01572       
01573     return *this;
01574   }
01575 
01581   SelfT& append ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n=npos )
01582   {
01583     return append(str.substr(pos, n));
01584   }
01585 
01589   SelfT& append ( const CharT* s, size_t n )
01590   {
01591     if (n == 0)
01592       return *this;
01593     
01594     assign_self();
01595 
01596     if (p_==NULL)
01597     {
01598       return assign(s, n);
01599     }
01600     
01601     if (char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+n>BUCKET_LENGTH)
01602       add_buckets((char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+n)/BUCKET_LENGTH);
01603 
01604     
01605     size_t j=0;
01606     for (iterator i=end();j<n;i++,j++)
01607       *i = s[j];
01608 
01609     length_ += n;
01610     clear_reference();
01611     
01612     return *this;
01613     
01614   }
01615 
01622   SelfT& append ( const CharT* s )
01623   {
01624     size_t len = getLen(s);
01625     return append(s, len);
01626   }
01627 
01631   SelfT& append ( size_t n, CharT c )
01632   {
01633     if (n==0)
01634       return *this;
01635     
01636     assign_self();
01637     if (p_==NULL)
01638     {
01639       assign(n, c);
01640       return *this;
01641     }
01642     
01643     if (char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+n>BUCKET_LENGTH)
01644       add_buckets((char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+n)/BUCKET_LENGTH);
01645 
01646     size_t j=0;
01647     for (iterator i=end();j<n;i++,j++)
01648       *i = c;
01649 
01650     length_ += n;
01651     clear_reference();
01652     
01653     return *this;
01654   }
01655 
01664   template <class InputIterator>
01665   SelfT& append ( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
01666   {
01667     for (InputIterator i=first(); i!=last; i++)
01668       appand(1, *i);
01669 
01670     return *this;
01671   }
01672 
01678   void push_back ( CharT c )
01679   {
01680     append(1, c);
01681   }
01682 
01686   SelfT& push_front (const SelfT& str)
01687   {
01688     // SelfT s(str);
01689 //     s += *this;
01690 //     assign(s);
01691 //     return *this;
01692     
01693     if (!str.length())
01694       return *this;
01695 
01696     assign_self();
01697 
01698     if (p_==NULL)
01699       return assign(str);
01700     
01701     if (BUCKET_LENGTH - char_index_in_bucket(0)+1+str.length()>BUCKET_LENGTH)
01702       add_buckets((BUCKET_LENGTH - char_index_in_bucket(0)+ 1 + str.length())/BUCKET_LENGTH, false);
01703 
01704     const_iterator j=str.end()-1;
01705     size_t g = str.length();
01706     for (iterator i=begin()-1;g>0; start_i_--,g--, i--,j--)
01707       *i = *j;
01708 
01709     length_ += str.length();
01710     clear_reference();
01711 
01712     return *this;    
01713   }
01714 
01719   SelfT& push_front (CharT c)
01720   {
01721     if (length_ == 0)
01722       return assign(1, c);
01723     
01724     if (start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH != 0)
01725     {
01726       start_i_--;
01727       set_char(start_i_, c);
01728       length_++;
01729       return *this;
01730     }
01731 
01732     if (get_entry_index(start_i_) == 0)
01733     {
01734       p_ = (char*)hlrealloc(p_, need_entry_bytes(++entry_size_));
01735       //shift entry
01736       uint64_t* en = get_entry_array();
01737       for (size_t i=entry_size_-1; i>0; i--)
01738         en[i] = en[i-1];
01739       en[0] = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
01740       start_i_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
01741       max_size_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
01742     }
01743     
01744     start_i_--;
01745     
01746     if (get_entry(get_entry_index(0))==NULL)
01747     {
01748       uint64_t* en = get_entry_array();
01749       en[0] = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
01750       max_size_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
01751     }
01752     
01753     set_char(start_i_, c);
01754     
01755     length_++;
01756     return *this;
01757   }
01758 
01762   SelfT& assign ( const SelfT& str )
01763   {
01764     if (p_!=NULL && str.begin() == begin()
01765         && length_ == str.length()
01766         && compare(str)==0)
01767       return *this;
01768     
01769     derefer();
01770       
01771     if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01772     {
01773       p_ = str.p_;  
01774       start_i_ = str.start_i_;
01775       length_ = str.length_;
01776       max_size_ = str.max_size_;
01777       entry_size_ = str.entry_size_;
01778       
01779       refer();
01780       
01781       assert(length_<=max_size_);
01782     }
01783     else
01784     {
01785       entry_size_ = init_entry(str.length(), &p_);
01786       start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01787 
01788       const_iterator j=str.begin();
01789       size_t g = 0;
01790       for (iterator i=begin();g<str.length(); g++, j++, i++)
01791         *i = *j;
01792         
01793       max_size_ = init_max_size();
01794       length_ = str.length_;
01795             
01796       clear_reference();
01797     }
01798 
01799     return *this;
01800   }
01801 
01808   SelfT& assign ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n )
01809   {
01810     if (n != npos)
01811       assert(str.length_ >= pos+n);
01812 
01813     derefer();
01814     
01815     if (n == npos)
01816         length_ = str.length_ - pos;
01817     else
01818         length_ = n;
01819 
01820     if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01821     {
01822       p_ = str.p_;
01823       refer();
01824       
01825       start_i_ = str.start_i_ + pos;
01826       max_size_ = str.max_size_;
01827       entry_size_ = str.entry_size_;
01828     }
01829     else
01830     {
01831       entry_size_ = init_entry(length_, &p_);
01832       start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01833 
01834       const_iterator j=str.begin()+pos;
01835       size_t g = pos;
01836       for (iterator i=begin();g<length_+pos;g++, j++, i++)
01837         *i = *j;
01838         
01839       max_size_ = init_max_size();
01840             
01841       clear_reference();
01842     }
01843 
01844     return *this;
01845   }
01846 
01851   SelfT& assign ( const CharT* s, size_t n )
01852   {
01853     derefer();
01854     
01855     entry_size_ = init_entry(n, &p_);
01856     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01857     length_ = n;
01858     
01859     for (iterator i=begin();n!=0; s++, n--, i++)
01860       *i = *s;
01861         
01862     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01863             
01864     clear_reference();
01865       
01866     return *this;
01867   }

01885   SelfT& assign ( size_t n, CharT c )

01890     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01891     length_ = n;
01892     
01893     for (iterator i=begin();n!=0;n--, i++)
01894       *i = c;
01895 
01896     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01897             
01898     clear_reference();
01899     
01900     return *this;
01901   }
01902 
01906   SelfT& assign (const std::vector<CharT>& v)
01907   {

01909         
01910     entry_size_ = init_entry(v.size(), &p_);
01911     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01912     length_ = v.size();
01913 
01914     typename std::vector<CharT>::const_iterator j = v.begin();
01915     for (iterator i=begin(); j!=v.end();j++, i++)
01916       *i = *j;
01917         
01918     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01919             
01920     clear_reference();
01921 
01922     return *this;
01923   }

01928   SelfT& assign (const std::string& str)
01929   {

01931     
01932     entry_size_ = init_entry(str.length(), &p_);
01933     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01934     length_ = str.length();
01935 
01936     typename std::string::const_iterator j = str.begin();
01937     for (iterator i=begin(); j!=str.end();j++, i++)
01938       *i = *j;
01939         
01940     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01941             
01942     clear_reference();
01943

01946 
01955   template <class InputIterator>
01956   SelfT& assign ( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
01957   {
01958     derefer();
01959     
01960     InputIterator i=first;
01961     if (i!=last)
01962     {
01963       assign(1, *i);
01964       i++;
01965     }
01966     
01967     for (; i!=last; i++)
01968       append(1, *i);
01969 
01970     return *this;
01971   }
01972 
01976   SelfT& insert ( size_t pos1, const SelfT& str )
01977   {
01978     if (str.length() == 0)
01979       return *this;
01980 
01981     assert(pos1<length_);
01982 
01983     if (pos1==length_-1)
01984     {
01985       append(str);
01986       return *this;
01987     }
01988 
01989     return replace(pos1+1,0 , str);
01990   }

02000     return insert(pos1, str.substr(pos2, n));
02001   }

02067   template<class InputIterator>
02068   void insert( iterator p, InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
02069   {
02070     uint64_t i = p - begin();

02072     
02073     SelfT s;
02074     s.assign(first, last);
02075     
02076     insert(i, s);

02078 
02085   SelfT& erase ( size_t pos = 0, size_t n = npos )
02086   {
02087     assign_self();
02088     if (p_==NULL)
02089         return *this;
02090 
02091     if (pos ==0)
02092     {
02093       length_ -= (n==npos? length_: n);
02094       start_i_ += (n==npos? length_: n);
02095       
02096       return *this;
02097     }
02098 
02099     assert(pos<length_);
02100     
02101     if (n >= length_ - pos)
02102     {
02103       length_ = pos;
02104       return *this;
02105     }
02106 
02107       
02108     for (iterator i=begin()+pos, j=begin()+pos+n; j<end(); i++, j++)
02109       *i = *j;
02110 
02111     length_ -= n;
02112     clear_reference();
02113 
02114     return *this;
02115   }
02116 
02121   iterator erase ( iterator position )
02122   {    
02123     uint64_t i = position - begin();
02124     erase(i, 1);
02125     return iterator(begin()+i);
02126   }
02127 
02131   iterator erase ( iterator first, iterator last )
02132   {
02133     uint64_t i = first - begin();
02134     uint64_t j = last - begin();
02135     erase(i, j-i);
02136     return iterator(begin()+i);
02137   }
02138   
02139 protected:
02140   SelfT& replace_ ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, SelfT str )
02141   {        
02142     int r = BUCKET_LENGTH- char_index_in_bucket(pos1);
02143     if (r < (int)str.length())
02144       r += (str.length()-r)%BUCKET_LENGTH;
02145     else r = str.length();
02146     
02147     size_t n = BUCKET_LENGTH- char_index_in_bucket(pos1);
02148     if (n < n1)
02149       n += (n1-n)%BUCKET_LENGTH;
02150     else n = n1;
02151 
02152     r -= n;
02153 
02154     if (r>0)
02155     {
02156       //std::cout<<r<<" "<<char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)<<std::endl;
02157       
02158       size_t y = (BUCKET_LENGTH - char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)-1);
02159       if ((size_t)r > y)
02160         add_buckets(need_bucket_num(r-y));
02161 
02162       // move
02163       size_t pos = length_-1;
02164       for (iterator i=end()-1, j=end()-1+r; pos>=pos1+n1;pos--,i--,j--)
02165       {
02166         *j = *i;
02167       }
02168       
02169     }
02170     else
02171     {
02172       //move
02173       for (iterator i=begin()+pos1+n1, j=begin()+(pos1+n1+r); i<end();j++, i++)
02174         *j = *i;
02175     }
02176     
02177     length_ += r;
02178 
02179     // add buckets
02180     if (str.length()>n1 && str.length() + char_index_in_bucket(pos1) - n1 >= 2*BUCKET_LENGTH)
02181     {      
02182       size_t k = (str.length() + char_index_in_bucket(pos1)-n1)/BUCKET_LENGTH-1;
02183       size_t m = get_entry_index(pos1);
02184 
02185       if (end_entry_index()+k>=entry_size_)
02186       {
02187         extend_entry(k);
02188       }
02189       
02190       uint64_t* entry = get_entry_array();
02191       for (size_t i=end_entry_index()+k; i-k>m; i--)
02192         entry[i] = entry[i-k];
02193 
02194       for (size_t i=0; i<k; i++)
02195         entry[m+1+i] = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
02196       
02197       length_ += k*BUCKET_LENGTH;
02198       max_size_ += k;
02199     }
02200 
02201     //delete bucket
02202     if (str.length()<n1 && n1 + char_index_in_bucket(pos1) - str.length()>=2*BUCKET_LENGTH)
02203     {
02204       size_t k = (n1+ char_index_in_bucket(pos1)-str.length())/BUCKET_LENGTH;
02205       size_t m = get_entry_index(pos1);
02206       
02207       uint64_t* entry = get_entry_array();
02208       for (size_t i=0; i>k; i++)
02209         entry[i+m+1]=0;
02210       
02211       for (size_t i=m+1; i+k<=end_entry_index(); i++)
02212         entry[i] = entry[i + k];
02213 
02214       for (size_t i=end_entry_index()-k+1; i<=end_entry_index(); i++)
02215         entry[i] = 0;
02216       
02217       length_ -= k*BUCKET_LENGTH;
02218       max_size_ -= k;
02219     }
02220     
02221     
02222     const_iterator j=str.begin();
02223     size_t g= 0;
02224     for (iterator i=begin()+pos1;g<str.length();g++, i++,j++ )
02225       *i = *j;
02226 
02227     clear_reference();
02228     
02229     return *this;
02230   }
02231 
02232 public:
02246   SelfT& replace ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str )
02247   {
02248     if (str.length() == 0)
02249     {
02250       erase(pos1, n1);
02251       return *this;
02252     }
02253     
02254     size_t new_len = length_-n1+str.length();
02255     
02256     if (is_refered())
02257     {
02258       char* p;
02259       size_t es = init_entry(new_len, &p);
02260       size_t st = BUCKET_LENGTH;
02261       size_t ei = 0;
02262 
02263       const_iterator it = begin();
02264       size_t i=0; 
02265       for (;it!= end() && i<pos1; i++, it++)
02266       {
02267         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
02268           ei++;
02269       
02270         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
02271           = *it;
02272       }
02273       
02274       it = str.begin();
02275       size_t g=0;
02276       for (; g<str.length();g++, i++, it++)
02277       {
02278         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
02279           ei++;
02280       
02281         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
02282           = *it;
02283       }
02284       
02285       it = begin()+pos1+n1;
02286       for (; it< end();i++, it++)
02287       {
02288         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
02289           ei++;
02290       
02291         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
02292           = *it;
02293       }
02294       
02295       derefer();
02296 
02297       entry_size_ = es;
02298       max_size_ = init_max_size();
02299       length_ = new_len;
02300       start_i_ = st;
02301       p_ = p;
02302       clear_reference();
02303 
02304       return *this;
02305     }
02306     
02307     if(p_ == NULL)
02308       return assign(str);
02309 
02310     return replace_(pos1, n1, str);
02311   }
02312

02322   }

02410   template<class InputIterator>
02411   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, InputIterator j1, InputIterator j2 )
02412   {
02413     assert(i1<=i2);
02414     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02415     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02416     SelfT s1 = substr(i, j-i+1);
02417     SelfT s2 = substr(j+1);
02418     assign(s1);
02419     append<InputIterator>(j1, j2);
02420     append(s2);
02421 
02422     return *this;
02423   }

02435   size_t copy ( CharT* s, size_t n, size_t pos = 0) const
02436   {

02438     for (const_iterator i=begin()+pos; i<end() && j<n; j++, i++)
02439            s[j] = *i;
02440          
02441     return j;
02442   }

02498   size_t find ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02499   {
02500     size_t i = Algorithm<SelfT>::KMP(substr(pos), str);
02501     if (i == (size_t)-1)
02502       return -1;
02503     
02504     return pos + i;
02505   }

02508   {

02510     //ss.attach(s, n);
02511     
02512     return find(ss, pos);
02513   }

02521   }
02522   
02523   size_t find ( CharT c, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02524   {
02525     for (const_iterator i =begin()+pos; i<end(); i++)
02526       if (*i==c)
02527         return i-begin();
02528     return -1;
02529   }

02554   {

02556     
02557     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), str);
02558   }

02576   }
02577   
02578   size_t rfind ( char c, size_t pos = npos ) const
02579   {
02580     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02581     const_iterator i = pos==npos? rbegin(): begin()+pos;
02582     
02583     for (; i!=rend(); i++)
02584       if (*i==c)
02585         return i-begin();
02586     return -1;
02587   }

02610 //   size_t find_last_not_of ( char c, size_t pos = 0 ) const{}
02611 
02628   SelfT substr ( size_t pos = 0, size_t n = npos ) const
02629   {
02630     return SelfT(*this, pos, n);
02631   }
02632 
02664   int compare ( const SelfT& str ) const
02665   {
02666     const_iterator i=begin();
02667     const_iterator j=str.begin();
02668     size_t g = 0;
02669     for (; g<length() && g<str.length(); g++, j++, i++)
02670     {
02671       if (*i>*j)
02672         return 1;
02673       if (*i < *j)
02674         return -1;
02675     }
02676 
02677     if (g==length() && g == str.length())
02678       return 0;
02679     if (i== end())
02680       return -1;
02681 
02682     return 1;
02683   }
02684   
02685   int compare ( const CharT* s ) const
02686   {
02687     size_t len = getLen(s);
02688     
02689     const_iterator i=begin();
02690     size_t j=0;
02691     size_t g = 0;
02692     for (; g<length() && j<len; g++, j++, i++)
02693     {
02694       if (*i>s[j])
02695         return 1;
02696       if (*i<s[j])
02697         return -1;
02698     }
02699 
02700     if (g==length() && j==len)
02701       return 0;
02702     if (i== end())
02703       return -1;
02704 
02705     return 1;
02706   }
02707   
02708   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str ) const
02709   {
02710     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str);
02711   }
02712   
02713   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const CharT* s) const
02714   {
02715     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(s);
02716   }
02717   
02718   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str, size_t pos2, size_t n2 ) const
02719   {
02720     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str.substr(pos2, n2));
02721   }
02722   
02723   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const CharT* s, size_t n2) const
02724   {
02725     SelfT str(s ,n2);
02726     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str);
02727   }
02728 
02732   std::vector<CharT> cast_std_vector()const
02733   {
02734     std::vector<CharT> v;
02735     v.resize(length_);
02736     for (const_iterator i=begin(); i!=end(); i++)
02737       v.push_back(*i);
02738 
02739     return v;
02740   }
02741 
02745   std::string cast_std_string()const
02746   {
02747     std::string s;
02748     s.reserve(length_);
02749     for (const_iterator i=begin(); i!=end(); i++)
02750       s +=(*i);
02751     return s;
02752   }

02761   friend class boost::serialization::access;
02762   template<class Archive>
02763   void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)  const
02764   {
02765     ar & length_;
02766     ar & max_size_;
02767     ar & entry_size_;
02768     ar & start_i_;
02769     size_t o = -1;
02770 
02771     const uint64_t* en = get_const_entry_array();
02772     for (size_t i=0; i<entry_size_; i++)
02773     {
02774       if ((CharT*)en[i]!=NULL)
02775       {
02776         ar & i;
02777         ar.save_binary((char*)en[i], BUCKET_BYTES);
02778       }
02779       else
02780         ar & o;
02781     }
02782     
02783   }
02784 
02785   template<class Archive>
02786   void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
02787   {
02788     derefer();
02789     
02790     ar & length_;
02791     ar & max_size_;
02792     ar & entry_size_;
02793     ar & start_i_;
02794     
02795     p_ = malloc_char(need_entry_bytes(entry_size_));
02796     uint64_t* en = get_entry_array();
02797     for (size_t i=0; i<entry_size_; i++)
02798     {
02799       size_t k;
02800       ar & k;
02801       if (k == (size_t)-1)
02802       {
02803         en[i] = (uint64_t)NULL;
02804         continue;
02805       }
02806 
02807       en[i] = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
02808       ar.load_binary((char*)en[i], BUCKET_BYTES);
02809       
02810     }
02811         
02812     clear_reference();
02813   }
